title: Awinat mchicha (Moroccan almond jam biscuits)
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '100g ground blanched almonds or ground sesame seeds', '1 pinch salt', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1 pinch ground cardamom', '1/2 teaspoon ground fennel seeds', '100g unsalted butter, softened', '1 tablespoon clarified butter', '180g caster sugar', '6 egg yolks', '60ml sunflower oil', '60ml fresh orange juice', '2 to 3 drops almond extract', '1 orange, zested', 'For the icing', '1 egg white, slightly beaten', '1/2 tablespoon icing sugar', 'For the coating', '100g whole unpeeled almonds, toasted and chopped, or toasted sesame seeds', 'For the filling', 'jam of your choice']
